feature.label: GEMOC Moccml Constraint
feature.description:
The MoCC Modeling Language allows to defines MoCC constraints using automaton. It provides an extension to CCSL to define automaton. The feature includes metamodels and genmodel edits and editors.
(Includes moccml.constraint.core, moccml.constraint.graphical.editors, moccml.constraint.text.editors, and moccml.constraint.ccsl.solver.extension.automata features)
